item.title: MIMVista and auto-deletion of archived studies
item.description: The MIM keeps 60 days by default. That may be too much for you.. By default, the folder C:Program Files\MIM\config should make you really happy, it's got lots of plain text files with configuration for all kinds of settings. cleanup.txt has "ARCHIVE LEFTOVER AGE (DAYS) := 60 Change that to whatever you feel is appropriate for you needs.
